verses.roman:
kaiśora-līlāra sūtra karila gaṇana
yauvana-līlāra sūtra kari anukrama

synonyms: kaiśora-līlāra—of the activities before His youth; sūtra—synopsis; karila—I have done; gaṇana—an enumeration; yauvana-līlāra—of the pastimes of youth; sūtra—synopsis; kari—I enumerate; anukrama—in chronological order.
translation: I have already given a synopsis of the kaiśora-līlā of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu. Now let me enumerate His youthful pastimes in chronological order.
